siteMetadata.title: Scaleph
siteMetadata.description: 基于 Flink 和 Kubernetes 的开放数据平台，支持基于 SeaTunnel 的拖拉拽数据集成和 YARN 与 Kubernetes 集群上的 Flink 任务管理 - Open data platform based on Flink and Kubernetes, supports web-ui click-and-drop data integration with SeaTunnel on Flink, manage flink jar job both YARN and Kubernetes
